title: Data Collection
subtitle: Gathering vendor spend data from multiple sources
content:
Data Collection & Initial Assessment

Template distribution and data validation. This phase involves gathering all necessary vendor spend data from various source systems. Typically takes Days 2-7 (Phase 2).

Data Request & Template Distribution

Days 2-7 (Phase 2)

Process Overview:

  1. Send Data Mapping Template via secure channel
  2. Schedule kickoff call to review requirements
  3. Provide data security instructions
  4. Establish primary client contact
  5. Set data delivery deadline (5-7 business days)

Supplementary data sources

Collection Methods

1. Automated Extraction

-- Sample SQL Query for Vendor Spend
SELECT 
    v.vendor_id,
    v.vendor_name,
    i.invoice_number,
    i.invoice_date,
    i.amount,
    i.currency,
    p.po_number,
    p.department,
    p.cost_center
FROM invoices i
JOIN vendors v ON i.vendor_id = v.vendor_id
LEFT JOIN purchase_orders p ON i.po_number = p.po_number
WHERE i.invoice_date >= '2024-01-01'
ORDER BY i.invoice_date DESC;

2. Manual Export Process

  1. Log into source system
  2. Navigate to reporting module
  3. Set date range (typically 12-24 months)
  4. Select required fields
  5. Export to Excel/CSV format
  6. Save to designated folder with naming convention: SystemName_DataType_YYYYMMDD.xlsx

Data Collection Checklist

File Naming Convention

Standard Format:

[Source]_[DataType]_[Period]_[Version].[ext]

Examples:

  • SAP_Invoices_2024Q4_v1.xlsx
  • Oracle_VendorMaster_20250121_Final.csv
  • Manual_Contracts_2024_v2.xlsx

Common Issues & Solutions

ðŸ”´ Issue: Incomplete Data

Solution: Request missing periods, check system filters, verify export parameters

ðŸ”´ Issue: Access Denied

Solution: Submit IT ticket, get temporary access, work with data owner

ðŸ”´ Issue: File Too Large

Solution: Split by time period, compress files, use database connection

Pro Tip: Always collect 13-24 months of data to enable year-over-year comparisons and identify seasonal patterns.
